cause.description:
Children around the world are living in desperate situations every day. Many are forced into prostitution or slavery, are living on the streets, with disease, have no clean drinking water or don't have enough to eat. GLOBAL ANGELS gives 100% of all public donations to help them recover and start living healthy lives. Please visit www.globalangels.org for more information, and contribute to help this cause.
1. Feed and Educate a Child for a Year
2. Prevent Trafficked Children and Child Slaves
3. Protect Orphans and Street Children
4. Provide Healthcare and Rehabilitation to Children in Need
5. Provide Clean Water
cause.mission: Make the world a safer and kinder place for all children
cause.name: Global Angels
